title: Enabler: SN@TC: Integrate DTA WMS-TK via API into SDX Plattform (simple orders < 1day)
description:
Description
First details see attachment; Contact person WMS-TK APIs: Michael Wald
acceptance_criteria: logic to differentiate between simple / complex field service orders is implemented
connection to WMS-TK: Appointment-API (TMF646) and Workorder-API (TMF-697) is established
API for return messages is implemented
use cases/workflows to use WMS-TK interfaces and return messages are defined and implemented
"simple orders" are send via defined APIs (Provide Appointment-API (TMF646) and Workorder-API (TMF-697)) to WMS-TK
